CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: VEON Ltd is a global digital operator that provides converged connectivity and online services. The company provides nearly 160 million customers with voice, fixed broadband, data and digital services. Currently, the company offers services to customers in six countries: Ukraine, Pakistan, Kazakhstan, Bangladesh, Uzbekistan and Kyrgyzstan. The reportable segments are: Ukraine, Pakistan, Kazakhstan, Bangladesh, Uzbekistan. The company provides services under the Beeline, Kyivstar, banglalink, and Jazz brands.

value.name: Muhterem Kaan Terzioglu
value.title: Group Chief Executive Officer & Executive Director
